title: Dream Lover (몽중인)
lyrics: Intro:  jabeuryeogo dagaseomyeon meoreojyeo beori neun geudaeneun wae swigo sipeun nae bameul goerophineunji ijjaneun geon geudaende wae ireona yo geudae nata na jitneun pyojeong wae hapil bangaunji  gakkeumssigeun museun mareul na-ege haji man deudgo sipeo gwi giuryeo boado deulriji ana beoryeojin geon nainde wae ireoneun ji nun gameumyeon mi wohae ya hal geudaemani chajihaneun ĐK: nae bameun eotteo khanayo jisaeumyeon jisaeulsurok gipeun jameun nal gidari go geudae boatdeon himdeulge dwicheogyeotdeon naui kkumeul kkaeun geon ma khildeuthan nae sumgyeol  gakkeumssigeun he-eojideon geu nari chaja wa na-ajideon nae moseubeul tto dasi doedolryeo nohgo heundeulrineun haruneun sijakdoeneun de eogim eobsi kkok chaja oneun.. geudaemani chajihaneun ĐK: nae bameun eotteo khanayo jisaeumyeon jisaeulsurok gipeun jameun nal gidari go geudae boatdeon himdeulge dwicheogyeotdeon naui kkumdeu ri geuri joheungayo jichyeobeorin naui kkumeul chajawa juneun geo si geureom nawa eotteon marideun haeyo geudae soneul jabeul su itge haejwoyo ijen jamdeul si ganmaneul gidaril su itdo rok  ĐK: nae bameun eotteo khanayo jisaeumyeon jisaeulsurok gipeun jameun nal gidari go geudae boatdeon himdeulge dwicheogyeotdeon naui kkumeul kkaeun geon ma khildeuthan nae sumgyeol
